game.name: Gang Beasts

game.shortDescription: 갱 비스트는 탱글탱글한 젤리 같은 캐릭터들이 어이없을 정도로 위험한 환경에서 인정사정없는 슬랩스틱 전투를 벌이는 우스꽝스러운 멀티플레이 파티 게임으로, 비프 시티의 슬럼가가 배경입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gang Beasts is a silly multiplayer party game with surly gelatinous characters, brutal slapstick fight sequences, and absurd hazardous environments, set in the mean streets of Beef City.

reviewHighlights.text: I am willing to change my recommendation whenever the developers decide to fix online matchmaking when inviting friends. Simply does not work at all....
I like the funny style of fighting and i love the funny momments with friends :)
